name: BentoBlox Puzzle Game
description:
Get ready for a puzzle game that will have you coming back for more! Connect the dots and solve fun puzzles!

BentoBlox is a challenging puzzle adventure. Match and connect the dots before the timer runs out! Perfect for adults and children of all ages. A causal but challenging block puzzle adventure.

Special Feature: Depending on the time of day, the game adjusts its colors for a perfect gaming experience.

We are also working on some new top secret game modes and features. Stay Tuned!
